title: My Pixel 4 has been with Google for replacememnt due to the battery swelling for 6 weeks!
content:
I feel like I'm being passed from pillar to post trying to get my phone replaced. Google received my pixel 4 on 2nd Nov due to rebooting issues and the battery swelling and forcing the back cover off on one side. It is now the 5th Dec!
I have contacted them 4 times and each time they tell me it's being dealt with yet everytime it doesn't seem to of moved forward an inch.
I understand Covid is an issue at the moment but 6wks to replace a phone seems extreme!?.
